title: Interdimensional Radio - 60-Second TikTok Cut
description: A fast‑paced, humorous radio‑show style demo with 4 characters. Designed for screen‑recording; auto‑plays with timed pauses.

script.line: Welcome back to Interdimensional Radio, where the signal’s always crackling and the guests are... well, out of this world!
Zara, I just calibrated the quantum antenna and— *static* —oops, I think I tuned into a wormhole!
Hold up, Blip! If you’re pulling a wormhole, can you drop a beat from the other side?
*beep boop* …here’s the beat! *plays a 2‑second synth riff*
Yo, that’s fire! Let’s mash it with my classic 90’s scratch.
Whoa—did you just hear that? That’s the sound of a parallel universe saying ‘YES!’
If you listen closely, you’ll notice the background radiation is actually a secret recipe for cosmic popcorn.
Professor, that’s the *wow* moment—our listeners just got a snack upgrade!
Error! Error! My translator is overheating from all this excitement!
Quick, hit the emergency dance button!
And that’s a wrap, folks! If you liked the interdimensional jam, you know the drill—
